name: Soul Catcher v0.1
description:
Trapped. You, the player fell into a trap of death with no exit. collect the souls who fell before you and see how long you can survive.

Keyboard only controls

WASD - movement

[SPACE] - Jump 

[SPACE][SPACE] - Double Jump 

[SHIFT] - Dash

[P] - Pause

[F11] - Full screen/Windowed
